description: Updates the definition for a dimension. You cannot change the type of a dimension after it is created (you can delete it and recreate it). Requires permission to access the UpdateDimension action.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the dimension. Choose something that describes the type and value to make it easy to remember what it does.

parameters.name: stringValues
parameters.description: Specifies the value or list of values for the dimension. For TOPIC_FILTER dimensions, this is a pattern used to match the MQTT topic (for example, 'admin/#'). (string) ---

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the dimension.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN)of the created dimension.

nested_items.name: stringValues
nested_items.description: The value or list of values used to scope the dimension. For example, for topic filters, this is the pattern used to match the MQTT topic name.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in milliseconds since epoch, when the dimension was initially created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in milliseconds since epoch, when the dimension was most recently updated.
